name: AS_GCM_clauseInclusionAndExclusionLogicForClauseSet_v1_default
sail_code:
/*

DESCRIPTION: This rule represents the order of precedence for the FAR Smart Matrix, Templates and Rules when applied to provide a clause set. 
Modify this rule to adjust the order of precedence.

DEFAULT BEHAVIOR: The priority goes from left to right where the clauses from FAR Matrix takes highest while the template take the least.
FAR Smart Matrix/Rules/Template

CUSTOMIZATION STEPS: 
1. Change the order value in the below map. Only use values 1,2,3.
2. Make sure the map structure is intact.

NOTES:
1. Do not change the constant values.
2. Use the rule AS_GCM_clauseInclusionAndExclusionLogicForClauseSet_wrapper and the provided test cases to validate any changes 
to this rule.

EXPECTED OUTPUT TYPE: List of Maps

*/
{
  /* Clauses Included through FAR Matrix */
  a!map(
    type: cons!AS_GCM_TXT_CLAUSE_ADD_VIA_FAR_MATRIX,
    order: 1
  ),
  /* Clauses Included or Excluded through Rules */
  a!map(
    type: cons!AS_GCM_TXT_CLAUSE_ADD_VIA_RULES,
    order: 2
  ),
  /* Clauses included or Excluded through Templates */
  a!map(
    type: cons!AS_GCM_TXT_CLAUSE_ADD_VIA_TEMPLATE,
    order: 3
  )
}
